thread.section_title: TrekEarth - South America Travel Photo Gallery
thread.title: Plaza del Reloj

title: Plaza del Reloj
text:
(88161) 2015-07-02 23:34 
Hi Pedro, Beautiful Plaza, well photographied, good composition with the statue and nice colors for facades even this part is not sunny, well done. (51448) 2015-07-02 23:35 
Hello, Very nice scene from the old square. I like the colors and the atmosphere. Beautiful city. Have a good weekend. Matyas (6594) 2015-07-03 0:37 
Hola Pedro! Amazing place, amazing architecture, wonderful buildings. Superb monument, smooth people. Fine perspective. Good composition, very good cut. Regards! Photo Information
